glsa.title: Pavuk: Remote buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: Pavuk contains a bug potentially allowing an attacker to run arbitrary code.

background.p: Pavuk is web spider and website mirroring tool.

description.p: When Pavuk connects to a web server and the server sends back the HTTP status code 305 (Use Proxy), Pavuk copies data from the HTTP Location header in an unsafe manner.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a stack-based buffer overflow which could lead to arbitrary code execution with the rights of the user running Pavuk.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version.
